com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query

Interface QueryModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSequenceQueryModel, ChemicalQueryModel, MultiRCSBQueryModel, QueryFieldModel, QueryGroupModel, RCSBQueryModel, SequenceMotifQueryModel, SequenceQueryModel, StructureSimilarityQueryModel

    public interface QueryModel
    This interface defines a settings model for a PDB query. It provides default implementations for many methods. Implementations may represent either a single node in a query, or a logical grouping of multiple query components
    Since:
    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com

    • Method Detail

      • getQuery

        default com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getQuery(boolean isCount,
                                                                ScoringType scoringType,
                                                                QueryResultType resultType,
                                                                int pageSize)
        Method to build a JSON query from the object
        Parameters:
        isCount - whether the query should return counts or results
        scoringType - the type of scoring to use when running the query
        resultType - the type of results to return
        pageSize - The number of results to return in each paged query
        Returns:
        The query JSON

      • getQuery

        default com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getQuery(boolean isCount,
                                                                ScoringType scoringType,
                                                                QueryResultType resultType)
        An overloaded method to build a query, with a default result page size of 10 hits
        Parameters:
        isCount - whether the query should return counts or results
        scoringType - the type of scoring to use when running the query
        resultType - the type of results to return
        Returns:
        The query JSON
        See Also:
        getQuery(boolean, ScoringType, QueryResultType, int)

      • getCountQuery

        default com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getCountQuery(ScoringType scoringType,
                                                                     QueryResultType resultType)
        Overload method to retrieve the count query, which returns the number of hits rather than the actual hits
        Parameters:
        scoringType - the type of scoring to use when running the query
        resultType - the type of results to return
        Returns:
        The query JSON
        See Also:
        getQuery(boolean, ScoringType, QueryResultType)

      • getQueryNodes

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getQueryNodes(java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger nodeId)
        Method to get the actual query nodes for the query
        Parameters:
        nodeId - The incremental node id counter
        Returns:
        The JSON tree of query nodes for the current query

      • getChangeListeners

        java.util.List<javax.swing.event.ChangeListener> getChangeListeners()
        Returns:
        The registered change listeners. If the return value is immutable, e.g. as an unmodifiable List implementation, the default implementations of addChangeListener(ChangeListener) and removeChangeListener(ChangeListener) need to be overridden

        Method to save the query settings
        Parameters:

      • loadSettings

        void loadSettings(org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsRO settings)
           throws org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException
        Method to load the settings
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings object to load from
        Throws:
        org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException - if there was an error reading or parsing the stored settings into the query

      • validateSettings

        void validateSettings(org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsRO settings)
               throws org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException
        Method to ensure the settings are valid prior to loading. Ideally implementations will validate all settings, and throw an InvalidSettingsException highlighting all errors
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings object to validate
        Throws:
        org.knime.core.node.InvalidSettingsException - If there was an error or errors in the settings

      • getUniqueQueryID

        default java.lang.String getUniqueQueryID()
        This method generates a unique query ID. It is based on the KNIME instance ID and current system time, all Base64 encoded
        Returns:
        A unique query ID
